text: Anisokuze nikwazi ukwenza ubulungisa obufezekileyo kubafazi benu enokuba ningada ninqwenele ukwenza oko ngenzondelelo engakanani na, ke musani ukutyekela kakhulu ngakomnye kubo (nibayeke abanye bengahoyekanga) kanti ke ukuba nenza ubulungisa, nenze konke okulungileyo, noyike uAllâh ngokuzigcina kude kwizinto ezigwenxa, uAllâh nguMxoleli, uSozinceba
